description:
556 can hardly wait to pass the exam to become a space sheriff!  But he`s not doing so well with the practice tests.  Later, the platoon gets captured by Viper, leaving Lavie to rescue them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 556 宇宙刑事だっ! であります / ラビー におまかせ であります
556, Space Sheriff / Lavie, Leave it to Me
